0\nFOLLOWERS 0\nFOLLOWING 0\nMy Channel 0\nOther Channels Tap to view your profile & your post You can share social media in feed and social issues of your constituency in social issue!! Post on Social Media & Social issues of your constituency from a single button!! Join your constituency raise your voice through social issues and be the part of change!! Follow the people of your constituency, share your social media & social issues with them!! Our goal is to help the elected representatives understand the problems faced by the citizens at a micro as well as at a macro level in order to make better decisions concerning the welfare of their citizens.
